title: Isabelle Gougenheim M.H Scarf
description:
Urban art has always been one of Isabelle Gougenheim’s biggest inspirations – the scarf “M.H” acts as her love letter to this form of art. The unique design pays tribute to wall textures, drawings, pictures, and colors of our street.


Employing the world as her muse and a blank scarf as her canvas, French-American artist Isabelle Gougenheim blends her passion for art and an innate love for scarves into wearable masterpieces. After sketching her designs – which she explains, are “inspired by the souls of the city streets” – Gougenheim prints these urban poems on a luxurious and airy modal-silk fabric.


Details:
• Fabric: 85% Modal x 15% silk
• Size: 54“x 54”
• Designed in Chicago
